synopsis.text: Memories etched with the wisdom of ancient times adorn his form, sparking profound questions: 'Where do we come from? Where are we headed?' As he embarks on a quest for enlightenment, guided only by the light, this poignant journey unfolds in Xueqing Shao's 2016 graduate work from Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. A thought-provoking exploration of our origins and destiny, this animated masterpiece invites viewers to join the pursuit for wisdom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
